text: addehattin (putran) isakhineyum (petran) ya'aîkhubineyum nam pradanam ceyyukayuntayi. addehattinre santatiparamparayil pravacakatvavum vedavum nam nalkukayum ceytu. ihaleakatt addehattin nam pratiphalam nalkiyittuntâ€Œ. paraleakatt tirccayayum addeham sajjanannalute kuttattilayirikkukayum ceyyum
